acts.title: Leave a kind note for someone
acts.description: Write a thoughtful note and leave it where someone will find it.

acts.title: Pay for the person behind you in line
acts.description: At a coffee shop or drive-through, pay for the order of the person behind you.

acts.title: Compliment a stranger
acts.description: Give a genuine compliment to someone you don't know.

acts.title: Send a thank you text
acts.description: Text someone who has helped you recently just to say thanks.

acts.title: Pick up litter
acts.description: Collect and properly dispose of litter you find while out walking.

acts.title: Donate unused items
acts.description: Gather clothes or items you no longer use and donate them.

acts.title: Help carry groceries
acts.description: Offer to help someone carry their groceries to their car or home.

acts.title: Let someone go ahead of you
acts.description: Let someone with fewer items go ahead of you in line.

acts.title: Share your umbrella
acts.description: If it's raining, share your umbrella with someone who doesn't have one.

acts.title: Hold the door open
acts.description: Take an extra moment to hold the door for someone behind you.

acts.title: Send a care package
acts.description: Mail a small package of treats or necessities to someone who could use a pick-me-up.

acts.title: Water a neighbor's plants
acts.description: Offer to water a neighbor's garden or plants while they're away.

acts.title: Give up your seat
acts.description: Offer your seat on public transportation to someone who needs it more.

acts.title: Leave a generous tip
acts.description: Give an extra generous tip to a service worker today.

acts.title: Call an old friend
acts.description: Reach out to a friend you haven't spoken to in a while just to check in.

acts.title: Read to someone
acts.description: Offer to read to a child, elderly person, or someone with visual impairment.

acts.title: Bake for a neighbor
acts.description: Bake cookies or bread and share with a neighbor.

acts.title: Send a supportive message
acts.description: Reach out to someone going through a hard time with words of encouragement.

acts.title: Return a shopping cart
acts.description: Return your cart and one that was left in the parking lot.

acts.title: Share your knowledge
acts.description: Teach someone a skill you have that might help them.
